description_html: Truly multifunctional, the Fiore chair enhances any environment while providing a graceful solution for flexible spaces. Cleverly designed in an abundance of vibrant colors (green, yellow, blue, red, silver, iron grey, black and white), as well as wood veneers, un-upholstered, upholstered seat pad or fully upholstered options, Fiore’s Side model is a 4-post side chair that provides the ideal flexibility and comfort needed for workspaces today. All these features work in concert, allowing Fiore to rapidly change a space to meet the demands of today’s corporate and institutional markets.
